---
title: No Highlighting
format:
  typst:
    keep-typ: true
    syntax-highlighting: none
_quarto:
  tests:
    typst:
      ensureTypstFileRegexMatches:
        # none = no highlighting, plain code block
        - ["```"]
        # Should NOT have any highlighting tokens or classes on code cell
        - ["#Skylighting", "#KeywordTok", "```python"]
---

Test that `syntax-highlighting: none` disables highlighting in typst.

```python
def hello():
    print("world")
```
